description: A PHP script generating a web page for displaying a menu of food items with add-to-cart functionality, including database connection, dynamic content rendering, and styling.

methods.name: session_start
methods.description: Starts a new session or resumes an existing one.

methods.name: mysqli_connect
methods.description: Establishes a new connection to the MySQL database.

methods.name: mysqli_query
methods.description: Performs a query against the database.

methods.name: mysqli_fetch_array
methods.description: Fetches a result row as an associative, numeric array, or both.

methods.name: mysqli_num_rows
methods.description: Returns the number of rows in a result set.

methods.name: mysqli_connect_error
methods.description: Returns the error description from the last connection error.
